name: NuttX esp32s3-lcd-ev

specs.RAM: 512 KB internal SRAM, 8/16 MB external PSRAM

description: NuttX is a highly configurable RTOS that implements many POSIX standard interfaces for a familliar development experience and well defined boundaries between components. Espressif esp32s3-lcd-ev is a devboard with a touchscreen based on the esp32s3. This option creates a NuttX project for the Espressif esp32s3-lcd-ev based on the NuttX LVGL defconfig for esp32se-lcd-ev and a basic directory structure for your custom LVGL app.
shortDescription: NuttX RTOS project for esp32s3-lcd-ev board with LVGL
getStartedInstructions:
1. Install the NuttX prerequisites and KConfig frontend: `https://nuttx.apache.org/docs/latest/quickstart/install.html`.
2. Aditionally, install `unzip`.
3. Run `./setup.sh`.
4. Run `cd nuttx/`.
5. Run `make -j$(nproc) nuttx`.
6. Run `make -j$(nproc) flash ESPTOOL_PORT=/dev/ttyACM0 ESPTOOL_BINDIR=./`

actions.newContent:
kconfig-tweak --set-val CONFIG_ESP32S3_I2C0_SCLPIN 48
kconfig-tweak --set-val CONFIG_ESP32S3_I2C0_SDAPIN 47
kconfig-tweak --set-val CONFIG_ESP32S3_LCD_DATA6_PIN 8
kconfig-tweak --set-val CONFIG_ESP32S3_LCD_DATA7_PIN 18
yes '' | make oldconfig
